        • Method Detail

          • java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> defaultPraxis()

            Returns a default set of VFS action options (praxis) in case no task-wide set if defined for all URIs within the task. For implementation values see the appropriate operations in the VFS DSL.

            Returns:
            Map of options

          • @Input java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> getOptions()

          • @Input java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> getPraxis()

          • VFS getVfs()

          • boolean isUpToDate()

            Checks the state of remote objects and decides whether the object can be up to date

            Returns:
            true if the object can be considered up to date
